name: Microsoft Foundry Agents
description: Provision a Microsoft Foundry resource, deploy models, and create ad-hoc agents using the new Foundry v2 Responses API. Includes a code interpreter agent for data analysis and visualization, and a general-purpose agent builder.
author: Microsoft
setup_message: Azure CLI must be installed and authenticated, and a Foundry resource with a model deployment will be provisioned. The copilot agent will walk you through the process.
